text: Julitta Münch (25 July 1959 – 21 May 2020) was a German presenter and journalist.„WDR trauert um Julitta Münch“, WDR, 24 May 2020 She was born in Düsseldorf, Germany. In 1992, she and Jürgen Drensek became the first presenters of the , which she presented until 1994. From 1995, she worked at WDR 5, where she presented Morgenecho and Neugier genügt. From 1997 to the end of 2010, Münch took over the radio broadcast program Hallo Ü-Wagen at WDR 5. Münch died on 21 May 2020 in Lohmar, Germany, aged 60. ==References== ==Other websites== *Website of Julitta Münch Category:1959 births Category:2020 deaths Category:German journalists Category:German television presenters Category:Writers from Düsseldorf
title: Julitta Münch
